verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: Earlier Tuesday morning] [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: sent] [ARGM-DIR: out] [ARG1: an invitation] [ARG2: to North Korean leader Kim Jong - Un] [ARGM-PRP: to attend the White House following a historic summit in Singapore between the two leaders] .

Earlier Tuesday morning Donald Trump sent out an invitation to [ARG0: North Korean leader Kim Jong - Un] to [V: attend] [ARG1: the White House] [ARGM-TMP: following a historic summit in Singapore between the two] leaders .

Earlier Tuesday morning Donald Trump sent out an invitation to North Korean leader Kim Jong - Un to attend the White House [V: following] [ARG2: a historic summit in Singapore between the two leaders] .
